00109 
00110 /*
00111  * Send a p2p message from the specified inbox using the throttle.
00112  * The lifecycle of the message sent is controlled by the user of the API. The
00113  * callback indicates when the API is no longer using the message and can be
00114  * destroyed/reused by the application.
00115  *
00116  * @param publisher The mamaPublisher from which to send the message.
00117  * @param inbox The mamaInbox which will process any response to the sent message.
00118  * @param msg The mamaMsg to send.
00119  * @param sendCompleteCb The callback which will be invoked when the message
00120  * is sent from the throttle queue.
00121  * @param closure User supplied data returned when the callback is invoked.
00122  */
00123 MAMAExpDLL
00124 extern mama_status
00125 mamaPublisher_sendFromInboxWithThrottle (mamaPublisher               publisher,
00126                                          mamaInbox                   inbox,
00127                                          mamaMsg                     msg,
00128                                          mamaThrottledSendCompleteCb sendCompleteCb,
00129                                          void*                       closure);
00130 
00131 /*
00132  * Send a p2p message from the specified inbox.
00133  *
00134  * @param publisher The mamaPublisher from which to send the message
00135  * @param inbox The mamaInbox which will process any response to the sent
00136  * message.
00137  * @param msg The mamaMsg to send.
00138  */
00139 MAMAExpDLL
00140 extern mama_status
00141 mamaPublisher_sendFromInbox (mamaPublisher publisher,
00142                              mamaInbox inbox,
00143                              mamaMsg msg);
00144

00156 mamaPublisher_sendReplyToInboxHandle (mamaPublisher publisher,
